name: Don't Hide [demo]
description:
You captured the unwanting attention of the most unhinged and strongest person you have ever met... How blessed you are!

You managed to escape from the house where he kept you, but for how long? What will be your priority: Your safety or Your freedom? Whatever you choose, Good luck!

!! This project is a big DRAFT !!
